title: Winter is superior to Summer.
body:
Because snow, snow sports, holidays, ice, icicles, mittens, less crime, more cheer, higher birthrates, less abortions, less depressions, more happiness, more food, more chocolate, less salad, less rain, less heat, more fire places, less wars, more love, more marriages, less divorces, less cheating, more intimacy, more reading, less television watching, more traveling, less anime, more working out, less final fantasy music, more real music, less butter, more cream, less cereal, more toast, more good less evil.

Also today was the first day of the year where i had to use my car heater instead of the AC yay!
